title: Devolution
data:
{| cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" border="1"
|- style="font-style:italic;" 
|Rank||Effect||Flavor
|-
|1||Gain further malmutations until trait expires.||You have hidden genetic defects.
|-
|2||Same as previous level, though lasts longer.||You have terrible hidden genetic defects.
|-
| colspan="3" |
Triggers about every 1/4 [[XL]]'s worth of XP, providing another [[bad mutation]]. Every two activations it reduces its level by one.
|- style="font-style:italic;" 
| colspan="3" |
[[Bad_mutations|Bad mutation]]
|}
